name: Project 4 Tutorial Submission
description:
This is my Project 4 3D FPS Tutorial Submission

3 major modifications

Level 1 - Get to the portal that is behind a door that needs to be open with the key with a few enemies blocking the entrance.

Level 2 - Fight the boss with the electro gun only and the boss is renamed and firing rate and spawners are modifed.

Level 3 - Going inside the base and its a maze and you have to find the right key to beat the level and there will be a lot of rooms with tons of enemies.

Enhance the Terrain for the main menu and the levels and change the name for the main menu and the instructions and credits will be filled out.

Each level uses one gun per level for example level 1 is the pistol level 2 is the electro gun and level 3 has the shotgun.

Credits:

Created By Vinh Tran
